potionbrewer:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
potionbrewer:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

potionbrewer:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
potionbrewer:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
potionbrewer:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

potionbrewer:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
potionbrewer:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a *TOUCH.

potionbrewer:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
potionbrewer:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !potionbrewer:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

potionbrewer:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
potionbrewer:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !potionbrewer:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

potionbrewer:Collect.NAME: Collect
potionbrewer:Collect.DESCRIPTION: Collect a potionbrewer:Reagent from an enemy. Apply !M! Vulnerable. Exhaust.
